snippet: In a letter to Electra Private Equity shareholders, the activist investor Edward J. Bramson said a change in approach in Electra’s strategy could increase the value of its shares by about $1.6 billion.
abstract: In a letter to Electra Private Equity shareholders, the activist investor Edward J. Bramson said a change in approach in Electra’s strategy could increase the value of its shares by about $1.6 billion.

headline.main: Sherborne Steps Up Pressure on Electra Private Equity Before Shareholder Vote
